page.title: 08HARTLIP SCHOOL AND CHURCH
page.content: {Hartlip Church,dedicated to St.Michael and All Angels,in the village centre. With its Church Services,Sunday School Choir,Bellringers,Sanctuary Guild, Church Council and Youth Club,it is the focus of village life.The east end of the church is 13th century, but renovations were made in 1865. Outstanding features;the wall arcade of 13 century arches & the 14 century tower.The oldest brasses are dated 1461 and 1577.There are many old family tombs.There are close links between the church and school. {Hartlip School was founded and endowed in 1678 by Mary Gibbon,wife of the Vicar to educate children of the village,as it does today.It is the 2nd oldest Primary School in the country.
